title: Customized Competency Enhancement Project for Digitally Marginalized Elderly Women

context.additional_context: Field-immersive education for learners with geographical and economic accessibility constraints.

learning_goals: Learners can independently utilize at least three mobile applications for solving everyday problems
Learners can explain basic digital security principles (password settings, personal information management, etc.) with 90% accuracy
Learners can plan and execute digital literacy expansion projects in collaboration with local communities

constraints.accessibility: 저시력자용 고대비 디스플레이, 청각 장애인을 위한 시각적 안내 자료

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
